articles.title: Jennifer Garner, Tessa Thompson lead Hollywood Reporter's 2021 Women in Entertainment event - Daily Mail
articles.description: Jennifer Garner, Tessa Thompson and Selma Blair were among the high-profile stars at The Hollywood Reporter's Women in Entertainment event in Los Angeles on Wednesday.
articles.content:
A bevy of high-profile women in Hollywood came together on Wednesday for The Hollywood Reporter's 2021 Women in Entertainment gala.
